GStreamer Base Plugins 0.10 Plugins Reference Manual

gnomevfs

— elements to read from and write to Gnome-VFS uri's

Plugin Information

filename libgstgnomevfs.so
version 0.10.16
run-time license LGPL
package GStreamer Base Plug-ins source release
origin Unknown package origin

Elements

gnomevfssink Write a stream to a GnomeVFS URI
gnomevfssrc Read from any GnomeVFS-supported file
